abilities.Aerial Deplyoment: If this moddel starts the game in Hover mode and in Strategic Reserves, it can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second, or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules.
abilities.Transport: This model has a transport capacity of 11 Sktiarii Infantry or Tech-Priest Infantry models. It cannot transport Jump Pack or Kataphron models.
abilities.Deadly Demise D3: This unit has a chance to explode on death for D3 Mortal Wounds.
abilities.Deep Strike: This model can use the rules for Deep Striking
abilities.Hover: This unit can elect to be in Hover Mode instead of being useless

loadouts.name: Default Configuration
loadouts.description: Each model is equipped with a Cognis Heavy Stubber Array and an Armoured Hull.
additional_abilities: Each time you select the bearer's unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6, on a 5+ you cain 1 Command Point.

loadouts.name: Chaff Launcher
loadouts.description: Each model's Command Uplink may be replaced with a Chaff Launcher
additional_abilities: This unit has the Smoke Keyword
